Hi Everyone, I’m experienced in organizing AI hackathons. I thought it may be interesting to introduce AI to FLL. Here is a tutorial video introducing ideas of applying AI in this year’s innovation challenge - submerged.

This is a new area that I am exploring. I’d appreciate your feedback!
